pheatmap(sig_gene_mat_scaled,
         show_rownames = TRUE,
         show_colnames = FALSE,
         clustering_distance_rows = "euclidean",
         clustering_distance_cols = "euclidean",
         clustering_method = "complete",
         fontsize_row = 6,
         fontsize_col = 10,
         annotation_row = tf_status,
         main = "Clustering of Significant Genes")
